ModMetaData.name: 复合石材
ModMetaData.author: YangHgRi
ModMetaData.description:
添加了一种全新的石材,可由所有种类的石块切割而成,强迫症玩家必备,微正义.
注意:DLC并非必需.
1.02更新:添加对Bulk Stone Cutting的补丁，支持批量切割复合石材，同时拥有批量精致/快速切割。 当你同时拥有Vanilla Furniture Expand - Production的时候，将所有原属于bulk stone cutting里面的Powered bulk stonecutting table(电动量产切石桌)的清单移动到BFE-Production的electric stonecutter's table(钢铁切石桌(电力))上，且移除Powered bulk stonecutting table(电动量产切石桌).
1.01更新:支持DLC-Royalty和Simply More Bridges(Continued).
拓展支持: Vanilla Furniture Expanded - Production https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1880253632 Simply More Bridges (Continued) https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2012484790 bulk stone cutting https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2007513347
